root.name: Backyard Basketball
root.description: Besides the NBA and WNBA players in this game you could also play as the classic set of fictional characters.Â Jocinda Smithscreen shot Ronny Dobbs Mario Luna Achmed Khan Tony Delvecchio Dimitri Petrovich Gretchen Hasselhoff Lueane Lui Kimmy Eckman Ricky Johnson Annie Frazier Mikey Thomas Lisa Crocket Amir Khan Sally Dobbs Pete Wheeler Dante Robinson Vicki Kawaguchi Reese Worthington Kenny Kawaguchi Stephanie Morgan Sidney Weber Ashely Weber Angela Delvecchio Marky Dubois Pablo Sanchez Billy Jean Blackwood Jorge Garcia Ernie Steele
